featuredProjects.title: Leveraging Semantics to Retrofit Security and Resiliency in Legacy CPS
featuredProjects.description: For deployed and legacy systems, how can we leverage knowledge about a cyber-physical system's semantics, e.g., the underlying physical equations, to enhance safety and security at all levels of the software stack?
featuredProjects.impact: Developing methods to enhance security in deployed industrial control systems without requiring hardware changes.

featuredProjects.title: Integrating Human Logic & Deep Learning for Trustworthy Autonomous Design
featuredProjects.description: What are the correct ways to interface symbolic knowledge and deep learning models in cyber-physical systems that allow humans to understand and intervene decision-making processes?
featuredProjects.impact: Creating interpretable AI systems for critical autonomous applications that maintain human oversight capabilities.

featuredProjects.title: Secure, Private, and Useful Ubiquitous Sensing
featuredProjects.description: With the explosion of IoT sensors, how can we expose useful programming abstractions to developers while ensuring secure and private cyber-physical information flow?
featuredProjects.impact: Developing secure programming frameworks for IoT applications with privacy guarantees.

featuredProjects.title: SPHERE CPS Enclave: Reconfigurable Testbed for Cyber-Physical Systems
featuredProjects.description: NSF Mid-Scale Research Infrastructure project creating a $20M reconfigurable testbed for cyber-physical systems research, enabling large-scale experimentation with industrial control systems, IoT networks, and autonomous systems.
featuredProjects.impact: Creating the largest reconfigurable CPS testbed in the US for advancing industrial control systems security research.

featuredProjects.title: Neuroscience-in-the-Wild Sensing: Memory and Sensor Fusion
featuredProjects.description: NIH-funded project exploring brain-centered sensing platforms that integrate neural signals with environmental sensors for enhanced human-machine interaction and cognitive augmentation.
featuredProjects.impact: Advancing brain-centered cyber-physical systems for enhanced human-machine collaboration.

featuredProjects.title: Physics-Informed Security Mechanisms for SCADA Systems
featuredProjects.description: Leveraging underlying physical equations and process models to detect anomalies and prevent attacks in supervisory control and data acquisition systems.
featuredProjects.impact: Protecting power grid and water treatment facilities from sophisticated attacks.

featuredProjects.title: NSF FMitF: Formal Verification and Implementation Stack for Programmable Logic Controllers
featuredProjects.description: Collaborative research project developing formal verification techniques and implementation stack for programmable logic controllers in industrial control systems.
featuredProjects.impact: Advancing formal verification methods for industrial control systems security.

featuredProjects.title: DARPA SMELL-CPS: Symbolic Math Expressions from Low-level Logic in Cyber-physical Systems
featuredProjects.description: DARPA-funded project developing symbolic mathematical expression extraction from low-level logic in cyber-physical systems for enhanced security analysis.
featuredProjects.impact: Developing novel approaches for symbolic analysis of cyber-physical systems.

featuredProjects.title: NSF NCS: Enhancing Episodic Memory through Real-world Integration of Brain Recording and Stimulation
featuredProjects.description: NSF Neural and Cognitive Systems project integrating brain recording and stimulation with semantic alignment of human and IoT perception for enhanced episodic memory.
featuredProjects.impact: Advancing brain-computer interfaces for enhanced human memory and perception.
